title: Akiba Maid War
overview: Arriving in the great district of Akihabara, Nagomi Wahira discovers with wonder the profession of Maid, and dreams of becoming one in turn. More ready than ever to invest 100% in this discipline, she quickly discovers the real difficulty and the fierce competition that reigns in the industry. Alongside Ranko Mannen, her new colleague and rival, the young woman throws herself headlong into this activity, with a lot of curiosity and motivation!
